name: WooCommerce Products Ticker
author: Amity Themes

sections.description:
Minimal, Easy to Use, Advanced Configuration Options and more…

If you make your web store using WooCommerce then WooCommerce Products Ticker is very important and helpful plugin for your web store!. WooCommerce Products Ticker is a free widget that helps you to scroll your products bottom-to-top/top-to-bottom vertically. You can easily use this plugin and beautiful way to display your products in front of customers.

Plugin Key Features

  • Advanced configuration options.
  • Advanced Filtering Options.
  • Lightweight, Fast, Easier.
  • Default and 1 extra layouts.
  • Stylish & Modern Design.
  • Build With HTML5/CSS3
  • Responsive and Mobile friendly.
  • No coding skills required.
  • and more to come …

I am here to help. Drop me a message. Click Here
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  • Step 1: Visit Plugins > Add New and Search WooCommerce Products Ticker
  • Step 2: Click Install Now button.
  • Step 3: After Successfully installed the plugin, activate plugin from your plugins page.
  • Step 4: After activation, go-to widgets area, drag the WooCommerce Products Ticker widget onto one of your sidebars and configure its specific settings.

From FTP

  • Step 1: Download WooCommerce Products Ticker Zip Folder and Upload the zip folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  • Step 2: Activate plugin from your plugins page.
  • Step 3: After activation, go-to widgets area and drag the WooCommerce Products Ticker widget onto one of your sidebars and configure its specific settings.

Enjoy!
